test_bet module¶

class test_bet.TestBet(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Class to test behavior of Class Bet

setUp()¶

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.

tearDown()¶

Hook method for deconstructing the test fixture after testing it.

test___repr__()¶

string representation of object made

test___str__()¶

string description of the form bet on amount

test_loseAmount()¶

Testing loseAmount, Amount lost is basically amount wagered.

test_winAmount()¶

Testing method winAmount, should return amount one added with bet amount.
